**Tender Announcement**
=====================

### EC016-231400 - Building Condition Report - NAFC St. John’s, NL

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Project Overview**
-------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking proposals from consultants to provide a Building Condition Report (BCR) for the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Center (NAFC) in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Scope of Work

The selected consultant will be responsible for conducting a thorough assessment of the NAFC building to determine its current condition, identifying any maintenance or repair needs, and recommending improvements to ensure the building's continued functionality and safety.

### Eligibility

The following three firms have been pre-qualified to participate in this bidding process:

1. Eastpoint Architecture Partners
2. MacKay-Lyons Sweetapple Architects
3. Stantec Architecture Ltd.

### Submissions Instructions

Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

### Contract Award Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on a combination of technical merit and price. The proposal with the highest combined rating will be selected for award.

### Tender Closing Date

Proposals must be received by 2:00 PM (14:00 hours) on January 31, 2023.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Alexandria Dwyer
Public Services and Procurement Canada
(613) 992-1311
alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
